member.name: F:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicIdentification.m_BaseTemplate
member.summary: The base template. You cannot access to this variable directly. Use the BaseTemplate property.

member.name: M:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicIdentification.GetBaseTemplateThreadStartProc
member.summary: The main thread of the enrollment operation for the identification purpose.
member.remarks: Function prepares all necessary parameters for the enrollment operation and calls the function from unmanaged code. This unmanaged function sets all parameters for SDK and starts the enrollment operation. It helps to reduce number of switching between managed and unmanaged codes and increases speed.

member.name: P:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicIdentification.BaseTemplate
member.summary: Get\Set the base template.
member.remarks: Returns the base template. If enrollment operation for the identification purpose is not completed, the return value is null (or Nothing for VB).
member.exception: The class instance is disposed. Any calls are prohibited.
The identification operation or the enrollment operation for the identification purpose is already started.
A null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) is passed to a method.

member.name: M:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicIdentification.Identification(Futronic.SDKHelper.FtrIdentifyRecord[],System.Int32@)
member.summary: The function compares the base template against a set of source templates.
member.param: The set of source templates.
If the function succeeds, nIndex contains an index of the matched record (the first element has an index 0) or -1, if no matching source templates are detected.
member.remarks: The identification operation is stopped, when the first matched template is detected.
member.returns: The Futronic SDK return code (see FTRAPI.h).
member.exception: The enrollment operation for the identification purpose is not completed.
The class instance is disposed. Any calls are prohibited.
A null (Nothing in VB) reference parameter rgTemplates is passed to the function.

member.name: M:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicIdentification.Identification(Futronic.SDKHelper.FtrIdentifyRecord,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: The function compares the base template against a single template.
member.param: The source templates.
If the function succeeds, bResults contains result of the identification. true if the template is matched, otherwise is false.
member.returns: The Futronic SDK return code (see FTRAPI.h).
member.exception: The enrollment operation for the identification purpose is not completed.
The class instance is disposed. Any calls are prohibited.

member.name: M:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicIdentification.GetBaseTemplate
member.summary: This function starts the "get base template" operation for the identification purpose.
member.remarks:
The "get base template" operation starts in its own thread. To interact with the enrollment operation you should specify one or more of the following events: EventDescription
OnPutOnInvitation for touching the fingerprint scanner surface.
OnTakeOffProposal to take off a finger from the scanner surface.
UpdateScreenImageThe "Show the current fingerprint image" event.
OnFakeSourceHandlerThe "Fake Finger Detected" event. This event raises only if FakeDetection and FFDControl properties are true.
OnGetBaseTemplateCompleteThis event is signaled when the enrollment operation for the identification purpose is completed and base template is ready. If the operation is completed successfully, you may start the identification operation. If the enrollment operation for the identification purpose is completed successfully, you may start any identification function. The next call of the enrollment operation will empty the last received results.
member.exception: The identification operation or the enrollment operation for the identification purpose is already started.
The class instance is disposed. Any calls are prohibited.

member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the FutronicIdentification and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.summary: This event is signaled when the enrollment operation for the identification purpose is completed and base template is ready. If the operation is completed successfully, you may start the identification operation.

member.name: P:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicEnrollment.Quality
member.summary: Return the quality of the template (Read only).
member.remarks: Return value may be one of the following: 1 (the lowest quality) to 10 (best quality). If the enrollment operation is unsuccessful or was not started, the return value is 0.
member.exception: The class instance is disposed. Any calls are prohibited.
The enrollment operation is started. You cannot get this property in the current moment.

member.name: M:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicEnrollment.Enrollment
member.summary: This function starts the enrollment operation.
member.remarks:
The enrollment operation starts in its own thread. To interact with the enrollment operation you should specify one or more of the following events: EventDescription
OnPutOnInvitation for touching the fingerprint scanner surface.
OnTakeOffProposal to take off a finger from the scanner surface.
UpdateScreenImageThe "Show the current fingerprint image" event.
OnFakeSourceHandlerThe "Fake Finger Detected" event. This event raises only if FakeDetection and FFDControl properties are true.
OnEnrollmentCompleteThis event is signaled when the enrollment operation is completed. If the operation is completed successfully, you may get a template. If the enrollment operation is completed successfully, you may get a template. The next call of the enrollment operation removes the last created template.
member.exception: The enrollment operation is already started.
The class instance is disposed. Any calls are prohibited.

member.name: F:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicSdkBase.m_bFakeDetection

member.name: M:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicSdkBase.Finalize
member.summary: The Finalize method.
member.remarks: Decrements the reference count for the library. If the reference count on the library falls to 0, the SDK library is uninitialized.

member.name: P:Futronic.SDKHelper.FutronicSdkBase.FARN
member.summary: The "False Accepting Ratio" property (Read/Write).
member.remarks: You can set any valid False Accepting Ratio (FAR). The value must be between 1 and 1000. The larger value implies the "softer" result. If you set one from FarnValues values, FARnLevel sets to the appropriate level.
member.exception: The class instance is disposed. Any calls are prohibited.
You cannot change this property in the current moment.
Invalid FARN value. The FARN value must be between 1 and 1000.

member.summary: The "False Accepting Ratio" property (Read/Write).

member.summary: If the class is deleted by calling Dispose, m_bDispose is true.
member.remarks: After of calling Dispose, the class cannot be used. The class raises the ObjectDisposedException exception in the event of an invalid usage condition.
